original_text: Swarms of locusts will take over all your trees and the crops of your land.
korean_text: 네 모든 나무와 토지 소산은 메뚜기가 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Swarms of locusts will take over all your trees
sentences.korean_translation: 메뚜기 떼가 당신의 모든 나무를 차지할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and the crops of your land
